The Journalists of Color Resource Guide
A compilation of resources for journalists looking to level up their career and the newsrooms they work in.

Created by Lam Thuy Vo, Disha Raychaudhuri and Moiz Syed with support from The News Integrity Initiative at the Craig Newmark Graduate School of Journalism at CUNY.
